items.title: Anant Goenka has big ambitions: Make Ceat a global brand, KEC another L&T
items.description: Speaking on Moneycontrol’s series Latha & The Leaders, the young vice-chairman revealed his huge ambitions for the group

items.title: Explained: Centre's U-turn on installing anti-pollution systems in thermal power plants
items.description: Justifying its reversal of the mandate, the environment ministry said current exposure levels provide no credible evidence to suggest that sulphur dioxide (SO₂), under prevailing ambient conditions, is a major public health concern.

items.title: InGovern counters Viceroy’s short-seller report on Vedanta, urges reforms to protect Indian shareholders
items.description: The report underscored the broader issue of unregulated foreign short-sellers impacting Indian markets. As InGovern suggested, Viceroy’s report requires careful scrutiny. While Vedanta’s debt servicing and governance practices are consistent with global norms, supported by robust disclosures and regulatory compliance.

items.title: Global EV sales jump 24% in June though North American market struggles: Report
items.description: Sales in China jumped 28% from the same month last year to 1.11 million vehicles

items.title: Rio Tinto names iron ore boss Simon Trott as miner’s new CEO
items.description: Trott, 50, takes on the role after Rio sought a leader with more mining experience to focus on portfolio growth. Rio has many expansions in the pipeline, including a $13 billion splurge on iron ore, a range of new lithium projects, and plans to keep growing in copper.

items.title: HCL Tech Q1 FY26: Short-term pain for long-term gain
items.description: Margins took a hit because of the company’s investments for the future

items.title: Apple faces calls to reboot AI strategy with shares slumping
items.description: Apple shares have fallen 16% this year while traders bid up the shares of peers like Meta Platforms Inc., which is spending lavishly on AI

items.title: Guard The Grid: India to bar sharing wind project data with China, others for national security
items.description: Attackers can enter the network through wind installations and move on to other high-value assets. India thwarted nearly two lakh cyberattacks targeting its power sector during Operation Sindoor.

items.title: LIC appoints R Doraiswamy as new CEO & MD, first to hold full-term role under new framework
items.description: Under the new framework of the LIC Act, the insurance firm has merged the positions of chairman and MD

items.title: Predictable policies under PM Modi support investment and deal activity: JP Morgan's Anu Aiyengar
items.description: There is a heightened degree of dialogue around India in global boardrooms and clients want to use India as a hub for growth, Aiyengar told Moneycontrol.

items.title: Citigroup’s India commercial banking chief Bhanu Vohra exits
items.description: Vohra is now on gardening leave and is exploring other career opportunities

items.title: VIP Industries faced 'management crisis' over last few years, says promoter Dilip Piramal, ownership change 'best thing' for company
items.description: Dilip Piramal said VIP Industries has had a long stint of leadership, however, last couple of years have seen the share price taper off from an all-time high of Rs 774.60 per share. Even though the management had projected a recovery, but it has not played out.

items.title: AI 171 crash: Interim report found ‘no mechanical or maintenance issues’, Air India CEO urges against premature conclusions
items.description: Air India's CEO said the preliminary report found no mechanical or maintenance issues with the twin-engine Boeing 787 Dreamliner (VT-ANB) aircraft or engines, and that all mandatory maintenance tasks had been completed.

items.title: D-Mart: Can the stock sustain the valuation as results miss expectations?
items.description: Margin pressure likely to sustain in the current fiscal, limiting earnings growth in the near term.

items.title: Can the VIP stock run more post the change in control?
items.description: Multiples PE picks up a 32 percent stake from promoters, to buy 26 percent more

items.title: Data Story: Hindustan Aeronautics trumps Bharat Electronics in order book but lags in cash conversion
items.description: Order book at Hindustan Aeronautics doubled in FY25

items.title: ICICI Prudential Life writes Rs 100 crore in single-premium annuities in Q1, CEO cites falling FD rates
items.description: The 53.3% YoY decline in Q1 annuity business despite a Rs 100-crore write-off is largely due to a very high base in the same quarter last year, at around Rs 214 crore, CEO said

items.title: Dixon Technologies signs deal to acquire 51% stake in Q Tech India
items.description: The acquisition will be executed through primary and secondary investments, the stock filing said.

items.title: Dixon partners Chinese firm Chongqing to set up electronics component joint venture
items.description: Dixon is proposed to hold 74 per cent stake in the JV and the rest will be held by Chongqing

items.title: Renault cuts margin outlook, names CFO Duncan Minto interim CEO
items.description: Minto is taking over from Luca de Meo, who is leaving for Gucci owner Kering SA
